channel.title: Bad .class file?

item.title: Bad .class file?

item.description:
@hippie wrote:

Make sure your directory is correct.

item.title: Bad .class file?
item.dc:creator: @Tyler1993 Tyler1993
item.description:
@Tyler1993 wrote:

i think something is wrong in the signlink.java that might be the problem

or you might have changed the name of the thing

like at the top of the .java page there should be something like

public class signlink

if its not that then theres a problem but im not exactly sure.

Read full topic

item.title: Bad .class file?
item.dc:creator: @runegay runegay
item.description:
@runegay wrote:

I ran my client and in my run.bat i got this:

Applet_Sub1.java:5: cannot access sign.signlink bad class file: ./sign/signlink.class class file has wrong version 50.0, should be 49.0 Please remove or make sure it appears in the correct subdirectory of the classpath. import sign.signlink; ^

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.UnsupportedClassVersionError: Bad version number in .class file
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method)
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(ClassLoader.java:620)
        at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(SecureClassLoader.java:124)
        at java.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass(URLClassLoader.java:260)
        at java.net.URLClassLoader.access$100(URLClassLoader.java:56)
        at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:195)
        at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
        at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:188)
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:306)
        at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:268)
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:251)
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(ClassLoader.java:319)

but in my signlink.class i have this:

package sign;

public final class signlink extends java/lang/Object
    implements java/lang/Runnable
{
    /* Fields */
    private final static int clientversion = 317;
    public static int uid;
    public static int storeid;
    public static java/io/RandomAccessFile cache_dat;
    public static java/io/RandomAccessFile[] cache_idx;
    public static boolean sunjava;
    public static java/applet/Applet mainapp;
    private static boolean active;
    private static int threadliveid;
    private static java/net/InetAddress socketip;
    private static int socketreq;
    private static java/net/Socket socket;
    private static int threadreqpri;
    private static java/lang/Runnable threadreq;
    private static java/lang/String dnsreq;
    public static java/lang/String dns;
    private static java/lang/String urlreq;
    private static java/io/DataInputStream urlstream;
    private static int savelen;
    private static java/lang/String savereq;
    private static byte[] savebuf;
    private static boolean midiplay;
    private static int midipos;
    public static java/lang/String midi;
    public static int midivol;
    public static int midifade;
    private static boolean waveplay;
    private static int wavepos;
    public static java/lang/String wave;
    public static int wavevol;
    public static boolean reporterror;
    public static java/lang/String errorname;

    /* Constructors */
    public signlink() {
    }


    /* Methods */
    public static final void startpriv(java/net/InetAddress) {
    }

    public final void run() {
    }

    public static final java/lang/String findcachedir() {
    }

    private static final int getuid(java/lang/String) {
    }

    public static final synchronized java/net/Socket opensocket(int) throws java/io/IOException {
    }

    public static final synchronized java/io/DataInputStream openurl(java/lang/String) throws java/io/IOException {
    }

    public static final synchronized void dnslookup(java/lang/String) {
    }

    public static final synchronized void startthread(java/lang/Runnable, int) {
    }

    public static final synchronized boolean wavesave(byte[], int) {
    }

    public static final synchronized boolean wavereplay() {
    }

    public static final synchronized void midisave(byte[], int) {
    }

    public static final void reporterror(java/lang/String) {
    }

}

what the hell is wrong?
